Name: Adicolor 3-Stripes Corset

Description_title: A TIGHT-FIT CORSET MADE IN PART WITH A BLEND OF RECYCLED AND RENEWABLE MATERIALS.
Description_content:
Hugging close in all the right places, this corset celebrates adidas Originals' iconic style. Inspired by the brand's athletic roots but made for today, it combines a stretchy cotton blend with signature 3-Stripes and a slim, ribbed silhouette. A center-back zip secures the fit. 

By choosing recycled, we are able to reuse materials that have already been created, which helps to reduce waste. Renewable materials choices will help us to remove our reliance on finite resources. Our products made with a blend of recycled and renewable materials feature at least 70% total of these materials.

Description_title: A FLATTERING ADIDAS SKIRT FOR EVERYDAY WEAR.
Description_content:
Originals heritage, today's style. This adidas skirt brings an authentic vibe to a casual look. Made from a stretchy cotton-blend material, it has a loose fit that's easy to wear and drapes beautifully. Pair it with a tank top or an oversized tee for laid-back style that gets it right every time. 

The cotton in this product has been sourced through Better Cotton. Better Cotton is sourced via a chain of custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products.

Description_title: A SOFT, COTTON TEE WITH AN OVERSIZE LOGO GRAPHIC.
Description_content:
The Trefoil logo debuted on the world stage back in 1972. Ever since, it's been synonymous with sport style and the energy and beauty that sport brings to communities around the world. This juniors' t-shirt celebrates its rich legacy with an oversize Trefoil logo print on the chest

All day comfort
When you wear this tee, you're pulling on more than just heritage style — you're slipping into pure comfort. The all-cotton jersey build has an ultra-soft feel that feels smooth against the skin. The ribbed crewneck stretches with ease and holds its shape wear after wear.
